text: I was referred to Dr Tan Yia Swarm by my family physician for some issues to manage. My observation for this clinic and the surgeon are 1) a professional team  2) an empathetic doctor with good bedside manners 3) definitely not pushy  . I enjoyed my consult and my process of the surgery that I had to go through. It meant a lot to me when I had to manage my emotions over the fearful impending surgery .  A lot of people are fearful of young doctors . However I must say Dr Tan is definitely forward looking, knowledgeable, and definitely one whom I would confidently recommend my friends and family to.  Thank your Dr Tan for your implacable skill . Am deeply grateful.

Dr. Tan is a kind and gentle doctor who explains everything clearly. The nurses and staffs are also friendly and supportive. Even though I was nervous about my first surgery, Dr. Tan and the team made sure everything went smoothly. The surgery and healing went well. I also want to thank my AIA agent, Derek Lee, and his wife for recommending Dr. Tan.
God bless Breast Friend Surgery clinic and may it be a healing place for many people üôè

The nurses and staff were just as outstanding‚Äîalways so kind, helpful, and prompt in reminding me about my appointments and assisting with invoices and insurance claims. The positive and welcoming vibe at the clinic really supported my healing journey. I had an excellent experience with Dr. Tan Yia Swan.  She is not only a highly skilled breast surgeon but also a kind and patient listener. Her ability to explain everything clearly and provide genuine care made a significant difference in my journey. Dr. Tan was an exceptional counselor during our conversations‚Äîher words and compassion brought me to tears, offering me a sense of relief. Her expertise in diagnosing and managing my rare breast condition was remarkable, and her support gave me the confidence and comfort I needed.

I would also like to extend my gratitude to nurse Suzy who was equally caring, attentive, and supportive throughout the process. Their kindness and professionalism made the entire experience even more reassuring. I truly appreciate Dr. Tan and her team for their excellent care. Highly recommend!

Amazing care from Dr Tan Yia Swam. The type of personal care and advice that makes you feel better right away. As they say ‚Äúshe took the pain away‚Äù. She was extremely knowledgeable and answered all my questions in detail, with a lot of patience. Most importantly, she looks at the patient holistically and is able to provide very informed, personalised advice. Thank you for the wonderful care and advice.
